    SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+: The Ultimate Smartwatch at an Unbeatable Price

    Kevin Follow Jun 13, 2023 · 35 mins read
    Share this

     Are you in search of a feature-rich smartwatch that seamlessly integrates with your Android or iOS device? Look no further than the SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+. With its attractive price of just 1,000 PHP, this remarkable smartwatch offers exceptional value for your money. Let's dive into the impressive specifications and key features that make the SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+ a must-have wearable device.



    Unleashing the Power of SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+


    The SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+ is designed to elevate your smartwatch experience. Here are the key specifications that set it apart:


    Brand: SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+

    System Requirements: Android 5.0+ / iOS 10.0+

    Master Chip: Hs6621

    Bluetooth for Calls: AB5376A2

    Bluetooth Version: 5.2

    Heart Rate Chip: SC7R30

    Button Method: Full screen touch

    Charging Port: Wireless charging

    Body Material: Zinc alloy body + IML bottom shell

    Strap Material: Silica gel

    Packing List: Machine head1, strap2, manual1, Wireless Charger1


    Experience Cutting-Edge Features and Functionality


    The SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+ offers a range of innovative features that enhance your daily life. Let's explore the functionalities that make this smartwatch a standout choice:


    Dial Market Smart Split Screen Display: Personalize your smartwatch experience with the Dial Market, accessing a wide range of customizable watch faces. Enjoy the convenience of the smart split screen display, allowing you to multitask effortlessly.


    Advanced Connectivity: Seamlessly connect your SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+ to compatible devices using the scan code connection feature. Switch between different languages with ease using the Band Language Switch.


    Customizable Security: Keep your personal information secure with the password lock screen feature. Customize the components of your smartwatch to match your unique style and preferences.


    Enhanced Communication: Stay connected on the go with voice calls and social calling cards directly from your wrist. Make quick and secure payments with Alipay Pay and Mett, simplifying your transactions.


    Intelligent Assistance: Access an offline voice assistant, allowing you to get information and perform tasks even without an internet connection. Enjoy the convenience of offline collection and control short videos with Short Video Control.


    Comprehensive Health Tracking: Monitor your health and wellness with the SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+. Track your steps with the built-in pedometer, and make the most of various sport modes, including breath training, for optimized workouts. Sleep monitoring, heart rate tracking, and blood pressure measurement provide valuable insights into your well-being.


    Stay Connected: Receive incoming call and message notifications directly on your smartwatch, ensuring you never miss an important update. Get real-time blood oxygen level measurements and stay active with the sedentary reminder feature. Utilize the built-in calculator and alarm reminder for added convenience.


    Personalized Experience: Express your style with custom watch faces, and utilize the stopwatch for timing activities. Keep track of your progress and goals with the Health Weekly feature. Find your misplaced bracelet easily with the Find a Bracelet function. Adjust the display brightness with the Dimming feature for optimal viewing in any environment.


    Experience the incredible functionality and style of the SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+ at an unbeatable price of just 1,000 PHP. With its impressive specifications, advanced features, and comprehensive health tracking capabilities, this smartwatch is a game-changer. Elevate your wearable technology experience with the SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+ and unlock a new level of convenience, connectivity, and wellness monitoring. Don't miss out on this exceptional offer—get your SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch8 Ultra+ today and redefine your smartwatch experience.
